name: COLORFUR (Studio Allhar)
description:
COLOFUR Created for Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022

- There is 10 levels in the level selection screen, but it was only created 7 levels due to jam's deadline

Commands:
    • use "A,D" or arrow key to move / left stick
    • space  to jump / A button
    • shift to dash / X button
    • R to restart / Y button
    • L to look free / R1 button
Felipe Nunes:
    • Programmer
    • Artist
    • Game Designer
    • Level Designer
Others:
    • Music: Twin Musicom - Digital Voyage
    • Sfx: freesound.org (HeraclitoPD, Robinhood76, InspectorJ, sparkle1 )
Softwares used:
    • Unity Engine
    • Photoshop
